title: Can we get a PROJECT Riven please
body: I'm asking this because I think Riven is seem like Yasuo, Yi and Fiora. She should get a cool skin like that

replies.body: What are you even speaking? English?

> [{quoted}](name=Coolbluey,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=hycqQWB3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-24T02:02:43.134+0000)
>
> What are you even speaking? English?

He made 2 minor mistakes (tbh it can be banded together into 1), don't be needlessly harsh on words.
It's not a long post, so the mistakes seem more prevalent throughout. Also in what way can it be banded in to one mistake? Grammar?

> [{quoted}](name=Coolbluey,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=hycqQWB3,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-24T08:41:06.953+0000)
>
> It's not a long post, so the mistakes seem more prevalent throughout. Also in what way can it be banded in to one mistake? Grammar?

He just needs to take "seem like" out and replace it with something easier to use like "similar to" and the entire thing would have made total sense.

That's why I reckon that it's only 1 mistake. But really, as long as people are not typing incomprehensible ciphers or making facepalming classic mistakes such as "your and you're", I don't think one should get too worked up over it.
this is a toxic riven mane for sure
She is part of the arcade set which is completely separate to the PROJECT set

PROJECT Riven?

Nah, she has enough skins.
She literally has the most recent skin in game......
